solution_line_template: Lillian found {safe_mushrooms} of the mushrooms were safe, so there were {total_mushrooms} - {safe_mushrooms} = <<{total_mushrooms}-{safe_mushrooms}={poisonous_or_uncertain}>>{poisonous_or_uncertain} that she found poisonous or uncertain.

She knew twice the amount she ate were poisonous, so she found {safe_mushrooms} * {multiplier_for_poisonous} = <<{safe_mushrooms}*{multiplier_for_poisonous}={poisonous_mushrooms}>>{poisonous_mushrooms} poisonous mushrooms.
Thus, she was uncertain about {poisonous_or_uncertain} - {poisonous_mushrooms} = <<{poisonous_or_uncertain}-{poisonous_mushrooms}={uncertain_mushrooms}>>{uncertain_mushrooms} mushrooms.
